note.p: Naval officer. Second son of CD’s niece Lucy Caroline Harrison. Killed when his boat was torpedoed during the First World War.
Dorking Museum, ‘Lieutenant Commander Thomas Edmund Harrison’, https://dorkingmuseum.org.uk/lieutenant-commander-thomas-edmund-harrison/
UK, Commonwealth war graves registers, 1914–1921 and 1939–1947 (Ancestry.com, accessed 31 May 2019)
